articles.description: The visit marks one of the last stops on Kamala Harris' four-day Asia trip.
articles.content:
United States Vice-President Kamala Harris has visited the Demilitarised Zone (DMZ) between North and South Korea in the final leg of a four-day Asia tour.

articles.title: First complete T. rex fossil for auction in Asia could sell for US$25 million - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The Hong Kong auction of a mounted Tyrannosaurus rex fossil in November will be the first of its kind in Asia – and scientists hope the skeleton goes to a museum that will keep it available for public viewing and research.
